@graph.name: Aloo Matar - Indian Peas & Potatoes in Tomato Gravy ( Vegan)
@graph.description: Indian Aloo Matar Pea & Potato Curry is done in 20 minutes, requires only a few basic ingredients and is such a simple and quick plant-based weeknight meal.

itemListElement.name: Aloo Matar – Easy Pea & Potato Curry (Vegan)

@graph.name: Mums Aloo Matar
@graph.description: This easy Indian Aloo Matar Pea & Potato Curry is done in 30 minutes, requires only a few basic ingredients and is such a simple and quick plant-based weeknight meal. Gluten-free, dairy-free, soy-free. Oil-free version included.
recipeIngredient: optional additions: sprinkle garam masala towards the end (1/2 tsp dried fenugreek leaves)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add potatoes and Cook for 3 to 5 mins, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile coarsely crush the seeds in a grinder or mortar and pestle and chop the onion, garlic, ginger, chili by knife or a food processor.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add potatoes and Cook for 3 to 5 mins, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile coarsely crush the seeds in a grinder or mortar and pestle and chop the onion, garlic, ginger, chili by knife or a food processor.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer potatoes to a bowl. Heat a tsp of oil over medium heat. Wait till it's get hot. Add the crushed seeds and cook for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer potatoes to a bowl. Heat a tsp of oil over medium heat. Wait till it's get hot. Add the crushed seeds and cook for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onion, garlic, ginger chilie and cook for 3 mins or until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the onion, garlic, ginger chilie and cook for 3 mins or until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the ground spices and mix in. Add tomato puree and cook for 3-4 mins to thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the ground spices and mix in. Add tomato puree and cook for 3-4 mins to thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the potatoes, salt and water and cover and cook for 15 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the potatoes, salt and water and cover and cook for 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Check and add more water if needed. Add the peas and half the cilantro and cover and cook until potatoes are tender to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Check and add more water if needed. Add the peas and half the cilantro and cover and cook until potatoes are tender to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Garnish with more cilantro, pepper flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Garnish with more cilantro, pepper flakes.
